explanation: [0-0] Four people are on a high platform by the river, with tall buildings in the distance. A man in black clothes and trousers wearing sunglasses is standing on the edge of the platform, holding a wooden stick and carrying something. A man in red is facing the man in sunglasses, holding a game console and sitting on a stool at the edge of the platform. Behind the man in red, two other men in black shorts and gray shorts are squatting on the edge, facing left and looking ahead.

[0-8] The man in sunglasses walks forward with the wooden stick. The man in red, who was sitting, stands up, throws down what he is holding, and runs towards the man in sunglasses, knocking over a black object on the ground. Then the man in red falls off the platform, supporting himself with his hands on the edge of the platform. The man in sunglasses is knocked down and falls to the ground. Then, the scene replays the moment the black object falls and the man in red falls off the platform in a zoomed-in view.
